name: Colour Cursed
description:
You are cute little cursed 16-bit creature, you have the ability to change your colour by absourbing the colour from magic gems found throughout the world, however your curse restricts your movement you are only able to touch the same colour as you otherwise you will perish!

Colour cursed is a fun adventure platformer (puzzle) game where the player is trying to find a magic wizard to remove his curse. You must venture through treacherous lands in seek of your goal. Or just have fun bouncing around on one of the worlds many jump pads.

You will have to collect the wizard 3 primary colour keys before you can meet them.

GOOD LUCK! :D
